cs.ualberta.conditionlog
Class PhotoList

java.lang.Object
  cs.ualberta.conditionlog.PhotoList
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConditionList, TagList
public class PhotoList
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores an ArrayList consisting of the filepaths of photos. There are two classes that extend PhotoList. Both ConditionList and TagList use most of PhotoList's methods, but they have different constructors that load photos from their respective databases.

Author:
tgriffit

toBmp

public Bitmap[] toBmp()
Loads the image associated with each filename into an array of bitmaps.

Returns:
